text: Welcome, Mr. Washington is a 1944 British drama movie directed by Leslie S. Hiscott and starring Barbara Mullen, Donald Stewart, Peggy Cummins, Beatrice Varley, George Carney. It was distributed by Anglo-American Film Corporation. ==Other websites== * Category:1944 drama movies Category:British drama movies Category:Movies directed by Leslie S. Hiscott Category:Movies set in England
title: Welcome, Mr. Washington
